This directive, aimed at protecting children's health, comes as the strictest Stage IV of the Graded Response Action Plan (GRAP) is enforced. Construction bans and truck entry restrictions are also in effect, with schools adopting hybrid learning.

Emergency services are on the scene, with eight individuals transported to hospitals. The Prime Minister is coordinating with state officials and urging those nearby to follow police instructions.

title: Sydney shooting: Bystander tackles gunman at Bondi Beach; heroic act caught on camera
description: Chaos erupted at Sydney's Bondi Beach as a gunman opened fire, killing at least nine people. A dramatic video shows a brave bystander tackling the shooter and disarming him amidst the panic. Police have apprehended two individuals following the terrifying incident near a Hanukkah event.  The scene was one of widespread fear and immediate medical response.

title: ‘Difficult times’: Hamas confirms top commander Raed Saad killed in Israeli strike
description: Hamas confirmed the killing of senior leader Raed Saad and aides by Israeli forces, a day after Israel announced the operation. Saad, described as an architect of the October 7 attack and second-in-command of Hamas's armed wing, was reportedly killed in Gaza's tunnel network. This development risks further destabilizing the fragile truce.

title: Microsoft pay row: 8th-largest shareholder questions Nadella’s raise; blames board
description: Norway's $2 trillion Sovereign Wealth Fund voted against Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella's compensation package and his role as board chair. The fund cited concerns over executive pay transparency and the separation of CEO and chair roles. Despite the fund's opposition, Microsoft's board approved Nadella's increased compensation, citing AI progress.

His appointment ahead of key political challenges is seen as a thoughtful decision by the party high command.

While driving to drop his wife for election duty, their car fell into a drain near Sangatpura village in Moga district. Police suspect fog as the cause of the accident, leaving the teacher fraternity in shock.

title: South Africa: India-origin man among 4 killed in temple collapse; illegal construction cited
description: An under-construction Hindu temple collapsed in South Africa's KwaZulu-Natal province, killing four people, including an Indian-origin executive. The four-storey structure, built without approved plans, was being expanded when it fell. Rescue operations were hampered by weather, and the number of individuals still trapped remains unclear.

title: Roars and leaps! Vaibhav Suryavanshi fails to fire, Pakistan go wild in celebration - Watch

Bronny and Parker, who have been dating since August 2024, are a popular couple, with Bronny expressing his affection for her on Instagram.

title: Dwyane Wade Says “I’ll Miss Him” in Emotional Tribute to LeBron James
description: Dwyane Wade, reflecting on LeBron James' 23rd NBA season, expresses admiration and a fan's perspective on an impending era's end.  He acknowledges James' elite performance, even as fans call for retirement, and cherishes their shared championship history. Wade also humorously recalls the 'Big Three' introduction, highlighting the immense pressure and difficulty of winning.

title: David and Victoria Beckham net worth 2025: Football, fashion, business
description: Power couple David and Victoria Beckham boast a combined net worth of $900 million in 2025. David's fortune stems from his legendary football career and lucrative endorsements, while Victoria built hers through successful fashion and beauty empires.  Together, they manage valuable brands, support their family, and remain influential figures in global sports and fashion.

title: Climate migration begins: Tuvaluans relocate to Australia; special visas take effect
description: Australia has welcomed the first climate migrants from Tuvalu, a Pacific nation facing inundation due to rising sea levels. A groundbreaking bilateral treaty allows Tuvaluans to live, study, and work in Australia, receiving immediate access to essential services. This initiative offers a dignified pathway as the island nation grapples with existential threats from climate change.
